Protocols/BMLTiOSLibDelegate.html.name: BMLTiOSLibDelegate
Protocols/BMLTiOSLibDelegate.html.abstract: This protocol is required for any class that wants to control an instance of BMLTiOSLib.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibPermissions.html#/s:10BM.name: None
Enums/BMLTiOSLibPermissions.html#/s:10BM.abstract: The user has no permissions for this Service Bbody.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibPermissions.html#/s:10BM.name: Observer
Enums/BMLTiOSLibPermissions.html#/s:10BM.abstract: The user has Observer-only (can see hidden meeting fields) for meetings in this Service body, and nested Service bodies.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibPermissions.html#/s:10BM.name: Editor
Enums/BMLTiOSLibPermissions.html#/s:10BM.abstract: The user can edit meetings in this Service body, and nested Service bodies (but cannot edit the Service Body or nested Service bodies).

Enums/BMLTiOSLibPermissions.html#/s:10BM.name: Administrator
Enums/BMLTiOSLibPermissions.html#/s:10BM.abstract: The user can administer the Service body, nested Service bodies, and meetings in all Service bodies at or below the level of this Service body.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibDistanceUnits.html#/s:10.name: Error
Enums/BMLTiOSLibDistanceUnits.html#/s:10.abstract: This is a bad value, and should never happen.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorCodes.html#/s:10BML.name: BadDataReceivedError
Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorCodes.html#/s:10BML.abstract: Data was received, but it is bad data.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorCodes.html#/s:10BML.name: SendingUnknownError
Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorCodes.html#/s:10BML.abstract: There was an unkown error encountered while sending email to a meeting contact.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorCodes.html#/s:10BML.name: MessageInvalidFrom
Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorCodes.html#/s:10BML.abstract: The From: address was invalid when sending email to a meeting contact.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorDescriptions.html#/.name: SendingUnknownError
Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorDescriptions.html#/.abstract: There was an unkown error encountered while sending an email to a meeting contact.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorDescriptions.html#/.name: MessageInvalidFrom
Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorDescriptions.html#/.abstract: The From: address was invalid when sending email to a meeting contact.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorDomains.html#/s:10B.name: PermissionError
Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorDomains.html#/s:10B.abstract: An action was attempted that the user does not have permission to perform.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorDomains.html#/s:10B.name: MailSendingError
Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorDomains.html#/s:10B.abstract: There was a problem sending mail to a meeting contact.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.name: BadURI
Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.abstract: The URI does not point to a valid Root Server.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.name: WrongVersion
Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.abstract: The indicated Root Server is an unsupported version.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.name: MissingFields
Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.abstract: The Root Server has been too heavily modified to work with this class.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.name: NoServiceBodies
Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.abstract: There are no available Service bodies in the Root Server.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.name: NoFormats
Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.abstract: There are no available formats in the Root Server.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.name: AuthError
Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.abstract: An operation was attempted for which the user is not authorized (or the user is not logged in).

Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.name: BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadTestReasons
Enums/BMLTiOSLibCommunicationHandlerBadT.abstract: These are string representation of various error codes. The string can be used as a key to a localized string table.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorDomains.html.name: BMLTiOSLibErrorDomains
Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorDomains.html.abstract: These indicate the domains for BMLT errors (In an NSError object).

Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorDescriptions.html.name: BMLTiOSLibErrorDescriptions
Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorDescriptions.html.abstract: These indicate specific descriptions for errors within the domains (In an NSError object).

Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorCodes.html.name: BMLTiOSLibErrorCodes
Enums/BMLTiOSLibErrorCodes.html.abstract: These indicate specific codes for errors within the domains (In an NSError object).

Enums/BMLTiOSLibDistanceUnits.html.name: BMLTiOSLibDistanceUnits
Enums/BMLTiOSLibDistanceUnits.html.abstract: These indicate the distance units for the server.

Enums/BMLTiOSLibPermissions.html.name: BMLTiOSLibPermissions
Enums/BMLTiOSLibPermissions.html.abstract: These indicate the level of permissions for a Service body.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibServiceBodyContainer.h.name: item
Classes/BMLTiOSLibServiceBodyContainer.h.abstract: This is the actual Service body node.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibServiceBodyContainer.h.name: selection
Classes/BMLTiOSLibServiceBodyContainer.h.abstract: This is the selection state for this node.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibServiceBodyContainer.h.name: extraData
Classes/BMLTiOSLibServiceBodyContainer.h.abstract: This is any extra data that the user may want to attach to this instance.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibServerLang.html#/s:10B.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibServerLang.html#/s:10B.abstract: This allows the class to be treated like a standard Dictionary.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibServerLang.html#/s:10B.name: isDefault
Classes/BMLTiOSLibServerLang.html#/s:10B.abstract: :returns true, if this is the default Server language.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/SearchC.name: Unpublished
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/SearchC.abstract: Only show meetings that are marked as unpublished (and are also in the control of the logged-in adminstrator).

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/SearchC.name: FormatsOnly
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/SearchC.abstract: Only return Format objects (Formats will be only those used in the specific meetings returned in the search).

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/SearchC.name: BothMeetingsAndFormats
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/SearchC.abstract: Return both types of objects (The delagate callback will be called for each type).

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/Selecti.name: Deselected
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/Selecti.abstract: This is a hard NOT. This means that this criteria should state that the associated data item NOT be present.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/Selecti.name: Clear
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/Selecti.abstract: This means I don’t care. It means that the associated item should not be considered in the criteria.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/Selecti.name: Selected
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/Selecti.abstract: This is a hard YES. It means that the associated Criteria item should be present in the Search Criteria.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: SelectableServiceBodyItem
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: The idea here is that these are selectable. They can be assigned a state of selected, deselected or clear.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: SelectableServiceBodyList
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: This is a simple Array of SelectableServiceBodyItem instances.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: SelectableFormatItem
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: The same for formats.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: SelectableFormatList
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: This is a simple Array of SelectableFormatItem instances.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: SelectableWeekdayDictionary
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: This allows us to differentiate weekday objects.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: SpecificFieldValueTuple
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: This is used to specify a field, and a value for that field

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/Selecti.name: SelectionState
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/Selecti.abstract: These are the available selection states for Search Criteria.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/SearchC.name: SearchCriteriaExtent
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/SearchC.abstract: This enum specifies what kind of results we want from the search.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/SearchC.name: SearchCriteriaPublishedStatus
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/SearchC.abstract: This only applies when we are logged in as an admin. We can search for published, unpublished, or both kinds of meetings.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/Weekday.name: WeekdayIndex
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria/Weekday.abstract: This is used to index our weekday list.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: publishedStatus
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal Published Status.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: serviceBodies
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal Service body list.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: formats
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal format list.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: weekdays
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal weekday list.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: searchRadius
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal search radius value.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: searchString
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal Search String.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: searchStringIsALocation
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal Search String Is a Location selector.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: stringSearchIsExact
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal Search String is Exact selector

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: stringSearchUsesAllStrings
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal Search String Uses all Substrings selector

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: searchLocation
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal center location selector.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: specificFieldSearch
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal specific field value search criteria.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: startTimeInSeconds
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal start time (in seconds from midnight -00:00:00) search criteria.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: endTimeInSeconds
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal meeting end time (in seconds from midnight -00:00:00) search criteria.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: durationTimeInSeconds
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal duration (in seconds) search criteria.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: meetingsStartBeforeStartTime
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal meetings should begin before (or at) start time flag.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: meetingsAreShorterThanDuration
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Accessor for our internal meetings should be shorter than the duration flag.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: meetingsShouldStartAtOrAfter
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: An easy way to test or set a minimum starting time for meetings.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: meetingsShouldStartBeforeOrAt
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: An easy way to test or set a maximum starting time for meetings.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: meetingsAreAtLeast
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: An easy way to test or set a minimum duration time for meetings.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: meetingsAreNoLongerThan
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: An easy way to test or set a maximum duration time for meetings.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: meetingsEndOnOrBefore
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: An easy way to test or set a maximum end time for meetings.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: init(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Default initializer. We must have at least the server comm.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: clearStorage()
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: Make sure we completely deallocate our selectable lists.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: clearAll()
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: This resets all search criteria to default.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: getServiceBodyElementFromServiceBodyObject(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: This returns the selection object for a given Service body object.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.name: performMeetingSearch(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html#/s.abstract: This tells our BMLTiOSLib instance to perform a meeting search, based on our current criteria.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNodeSimpleDicti.name: library
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNodeSimpleDicti.abstract: Accessor for the handler’s BMLTiOSLib library (The Handler’s handler).

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.abstract: This allows us to treat the meeting as if it were a standard Dictionary.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.name: changes
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.abstract: This will contain any changes that are associated with this meeting.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.name: keys
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.abstract: Returns a sorted list of the value array keys. It sorts the default ones first.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.name: distanceInMiles
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.abstract: Read-only property that returns the distance (in Miles) from the search center.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.name: distanceInKm
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.abstract: Read-only property that returns the distance (in Kilometers) from the search center.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.name: basicAddress
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.abstract: This parses the meeting data, and creates a fairly basic, straightforward address.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.name: isDirty
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.abstract: This is always false for this class.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/c:@M.name: description
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/c:@M.abstract: This is a read-only property that overrides the NSObject description.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.name: init(_:inHandler:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.abstract: Default initializer. Initiatlize with raw meeting data (a simple Dictionary).

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.name: getChanges()
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.abstract: Requests all changes for this meeting from the BMLTiOSLib handler.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.name: sendMessageToMeetingContact(fromAddress:messageBody:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.abstract: If sending messages to meeting contacts is enabled, this function will send a basic email to the contact for this email.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.name: meetingStartsOnOrAfterThisTime(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.abstract: Returns true, if the meeting start time is after the given time.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.name: meetingStartsOnOrBeforeThisTime(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.abstract: Returns true, if the meeting start time is before the given time.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.name: meetingEndsAtOrBeforeThisTime(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html#/s:10.abstract: Returns true, if the meeting end time is before the given time.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.name: parent
Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.abstract: The parent node for this object. Nil if top-level.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.name: serviceBody
Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.abstract: The Service body information for this node.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.name: children
Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.abstract: An array of child nodes. May be empty, if we are a leaf.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.name: extraData
Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.abstract: This is whatever data the user wants to attach to the node.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.name: init(inServerComm:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.abstract: Default initializer. We must have at least the server comm.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.name: isInHierarchy(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.abstract: This checks a given Service Body node, and sees if it is in the hierarchy.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.name: isSBIDInHierarchy(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.abstract: This checks a given Service Body node by its ID, and sees if it is in the hierarchy.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibFormatNode.html#/s:10B.name: extraData
Classes/BMLTiOSLibFormatNode.html#/s:10B.abstract: This is whatever data the user wants to attach to the node.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibFormatNode.html#/s:10B.name: init(_:inExtraData:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibFormatNode.html#/s:10B.abstract: Default initializer. Initiatlize with raw format data (a simple Dictionary).

Classes/BMLTiOSLibFormatContainer.html#/.name: selection
Classes/BMLTiOSLibFormatContainer.html#/.abstract: This is the selection state for this node.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibFormatContainer.html#/.name: extraData
Classes/BMLTiOSLibFormatContainer.html#/.abstract: This is any extra data that the user may want to attach to this instance.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: serviceBodiesICanBelongTo
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This returns a flat (non-hierarchical) array of Service Body nodes that this meeting can be assinged.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: isEditable
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This class is editable.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: formats
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This allows us to set a new collection of meeting formats via an array of format objects.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: formatsAsCSVList
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This allows us to set a new collection of meeting formats via a CSV string of their codes.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: published
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This sets the meeting’s published status.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: worldID
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This sets the meeting’s NAWS (World ID).

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: locationCoords
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This creates new long/lat values for the given coordinate.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: timeString
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This parses a military time string (either HH:MM or HHMM), and creates a new

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: durationInMinutes
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: Sets the new duration from an integer, representing the number of minutes.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: startTime
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This simply sets the time exactly from components.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: startTimeAndDay
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This extracts the weekday and the time of day from the components, and uses these as new values for the meeting.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: nextStartDate
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This sets a new time and weekday by parsing the Date object provided.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: init(_:inHandler:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: Default initializer. Initiatlize with raw meeting data (a simple Dictionary).

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: addFormat(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This allows us to add a single format, via its object reference.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: removeFormat(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This allows us to remove a single format, via its object reference.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: restoreToOriginal()
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: Removes all changes made to the meeting.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: revertMeetingToBeforeThisChange(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: Reverts a meeting to the before state of a given change, but does not save it to the server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: saveMeetingToBeforeThisChange(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: Reverts a meeting to the before state of a given change, and saves it to the server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: valueChanged(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: Test whether or not a given field has undergone a change.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: delete()
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: Deletes this meeting.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: saveChanges()
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: Saves changes made to the meeting.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangeNode.html#/s:10B.name: beforeObject
Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangeNode.html#/s:10B.abstract: If there was a before this change meeting object, it is provided here.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangeNode.html#/s:10B.name: afterObject
Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangeNode.html#/s:10B.abstract: If there was an after this change meeting object, it is provided here.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangeNode.html#/s:10B.name: meetingWasChanged
Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangeNode.html#/s:10B.abstract: Each Dictionary entry is described by the field key. The content is a 2-element String Array, with 0 being the before value and 1 being the after value

Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangeNode.html#/s:10B.name: revertMeetingToBeforeThisChange()
Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangeNode.html#/s:10B.abstract: Reverts a meeting to the before state of this change, but does not save the changes.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangeNode.html#/s:10B.name: saveMeetingToBeforeThisChange()
Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangeNode.html#/s:10B.abstract: Reverts a meeting to the before state of this change, and saves it on the server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: distanceUnits
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Accessor for our internal Distance Units.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: distanceUnitsString
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Accessor for our internal Distance Units.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: availableMeetingValueKeys
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: These are the available value keys for use when querying meeting data.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: emailMeetingContactsEnabled
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This is set to true if emails sent to the server are enabled (Goes to meeting contacts).

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: emailServiceBodyAdminsEnabled
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This is set to true if emails sent to the meeting contacts also send a copy to the Service body Admin for that meeting.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: changeDepth
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This is number of changes stored per meeting.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: googleAPIKey
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This is the server Google API Key

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: delegate
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This returns the delegate object for this instance.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: rootServerURI
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This returns the Root Server URI used by the instance.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: isConnected
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This is a simple Boolean test to see if the instance successfully connected.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: errorString
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This returns an error String (if any)

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: isAdminLoggedIn
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This returns true, if the Semantic Administration interface has an administrator logged in.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: versionAsString
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This returns the Root Server version, as an easily readable String.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: versionAsInt
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This returns the Root Server version, as an integer. This allows easy version level checking.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: isAdminAvailable
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This returns whether or not the Root Server is capable of supporting Semantic Administration.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: defaultLocation
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This returns the Root Server center coordinates.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: serviceBodies
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This returns a flat (non-hierarchical) array of Service Body nodes.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: serviceBodiesICanObserve
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This returns a flat (non-hierarchical) array of Service Body nodes that can be observed.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: serviceBodiesICanEdit
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This returns a flat (non-hierarchical) array of Service Body nodes that can be edited or observed.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: serviceBodiesICanAdminister
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This returns a flat (non-hierarchical) array of Service Body nodes that can be observed.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: hierarchicalServiceBodies
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This returns a hierarchical linked list of Service Body nodes.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: allPossibleFormats
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This contains all of the possible meeting formats.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: availableServerLanguages
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This contains the response from our get server languages call (nil, by default).

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: init(inRootServerURI:inDelegate:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This is the default initializer. This is required. You need to supply a valid URI and a valid delegate.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: clearStorage()
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Disconnects the session, and removes all local storage.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getServiceBodyByID(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Fetches a Service body node by its ID.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getFormatByID(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Fetches a format node by its shared ID.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getFormatByKey(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Fetches a format node by its string key.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getAllUsedFormats()
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get every format actually used by meetings in the database (usually a subset of the entire format list).

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: performMeetingSearch(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This performs a meeting search, based on the search criteria that currently exists.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getMeetingsObjectsByID(_:searchType:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This performs a meeting search, based on a list of meeting IDs.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getDeletedMeetingChanges(fromDate:toDate:serviceBodyIDs:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get meeting change records for deleted meetings only from the Root Server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getDeletedMeetingChanges(fromDate:toDate:serviceBodyID:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get meeting change records for deleted meetings only from the Root Server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getDeletedMeetingChanges(serviceBodyID:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get meeting change records for deleted meetings only from the Root Server for a particular Service body.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getDeletedMeetingChanges(serviceBodyIDs:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get meeting change records for deleted meetings only from the Root Server for a particular Service body.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getDeletedMeetingChanges()
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get all meeting change records for deleted meetings only from the Root Server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getAllMeetingChanges(fromDate:toDate:serviceBodyID:meetingID:userID:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get meeting change records from the Root Server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getAllMeetingChanges(fromDate:toDate:serviceBodyID:meetingID:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get meeting change records from the Root Server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getAllMeetingChanges(fromDate:toDate:meetingID:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get meeting change records from a meeting within a date range from the Root Server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getAllMeetingChanges(fromDate:toDate:serviceBodyID:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get meeting change records from a Service body within a date range from the Root Server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getAllMeetingChanges(fromDate:toDate:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get all meeting change records within a date range from the Root Server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getAllMeetingChanges(meetingID:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get meeting change records for one single meeting from the Root Server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getAllMeetingChanges(meeting:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get meeting change records for one single meeting from the Root Server, with delivery of the changes to that meeting.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: getAllMeetingChanges(serviceBodyID:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to get meeting change records for one single Service body from the Root Server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: adminLogin(loginID:password:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to log into a server that has semantic admin turned on.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: adminLogout()
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to log out of a server that has semantic admin turned on.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: saveMeetingChanges(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This is called to set a meeting change.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: rollbackMeeting(_:toBeforeChange:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: This is called to set a meeting change.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: saveMeetingAsCopy(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Saves the meeting as a copy (does not save or set changes in current meeting).

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: deleteMeeting(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to delete a meeting.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.name: restoreDeletedMeeting(_:)
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html#/s:10BMLTiOSLibA.abstract: Called to restore a deleted meeting.

Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html.name: BMLTiOSLib
Classes/BMLTiOSLib.html.abstract: This class represents the public interface to the BMLTiOSLib framework.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangeNode.html.name: BMLTiOSLibChangeNode
Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangeNode.html.abstract: This is a special class that represents change objects.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangedMeeting.html.name: BMLTiOSLibChangedMeeting
Classes/BMLTiOSLibChangedMeeting.html.abstract: This is a special class that represents objects for meeting changes.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.name: BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode
Classes/BMLTiOSLibEditableMeetingNode.ht.abstract: This is a special micro class for editing the meetings for a Server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibFormatContainer.html.name: BMLTiOSLibFormatContainer
Classes/BMLTiOSLibFormatContainer.html.abstract: This is a special micro class for wrapping the formats.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibFormatNode.html.name: BMLTiOSLibFormatNode
Classes/BMLTiOSLibFormatNode.html.abstract: This is a special micro class for accessing the formats for a Server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.name: BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBodyNode
Classes/BMLTiOSLibHierarchicalServiceBod.abstract: This is a special micro class for aggregating a hierarchical Service body map.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html.name: BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNode.html.abstract: This is a special micro class for accessing the meetings for a Server.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNodeSimpleDicti.name: BMLTiOSLibMeetingNodeSimpleDictionaryElement
Classes/BMLTiOSLibMeetingNodeSimpleDicti.abstract: This is a special sub-micro class for iterating through the fields of this meeting.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html.name: BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria
Classes/BMLTiOSLibSearchCriteria.html.abstract: This is a special class that is used to gather and process meeting search criteria.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibServerLang.html.name: BMLTiOSLibServerLang
Classes/BMLTiOSLibServerLang.html.abstract: This class will present a functional interface to the server languages.

Classes/BMLTiOSLibServiceBodyContainer.h.name: BMLTiOSLibServiceBodyContainer
Classes/BMLTiOSLibServiceBodyContainer.h.abstract: This is a special micro class for wrapping the Service bodies.
